subject: Re: Can't add labels to entries in github issues
msgSnippet: I don t see any check boxes, and there are no drop downs for me.  That s the problem I m seeing.  Is that only available to collaborators?
messageBody:
I don't see any check boxes, and there are no drop downs for me. That's the problem I'm seeing. Is that only available to collaborators?

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
>
> So it works for me when I:
>
> - Select the checkbox next to an item.
> - Select the dropdown on the "bug" label.
> - Select "Apply to selection"
>
> Just to confirm, is that the process you're following?
>
> David Saff
>
> On Tue, Feb 23, 2010 at 8:20 AM, Loritsch, Berin C.
> <berin.loritsch@...> wrote:
> > Perhaps there is something wrong with the permissions or something, but
> > I can't mark the two bugs I entered as being bugs. Â The use interface
> > just doesn't respond.
> >
> >
> > [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
> >
